meanings.sent1: The asininity of his actions was evident to everyone.
meanings.sent2: Her constant asininity made it hard to take her seriously.
meanings.sent3: The asininity of the situation was so absurd that it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The level of asininity in his decision-making was comparable to a clown's antics.
meanings.sent5: The sheer asininity of his behavior left a lasting impression on all who witnessed it.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being asinine.
meanings.sent1: The asininity of his remarks was quite shocking.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't help but roll her eyes at the asininity of his arguments.
meanings.sent3: The asininity of the debate made it hard to take any of the participants seriously.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with an air of asininity that was hard to ignore.
meanings.sent5: His expression clearly showed his frustration with the asininity of the situation.
